page.title: 17Road Travel, St. Leonards
page.content: The eastern part of our area is a busy one, with quite a lot of{through {traffic.}In 1985 nearly every family owns one car, many have two. The main London road,{A21,}passesthrough at Hollington and is especially busy at summer weekends. There are plans to improve this road in the next few years. The A2100 Ridge road forms an E-W link from the eastern part of Hastings. The B2159 road to Battle joins this. One morning we counted 74 cars in 10 minutes going in one direction along here. About 5 years ago{Queensway}was built, coming from the A21. It has made travelling easier to Tesco's and the Castleham Industrial Site. Soon it is planned to continue Queensway to form a new by-pass road to Bexhill.This new housing in the area means even more local traffic..
